full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 162 of 262 1873
LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross
1 A. Correct. Yes.
2 Q. So you were a pilot for Jeffrey Epstein for almost 30 years, right?
3 A. Twenty-eight for him.
4 Q. Twenty-eight.
5 A. Right.
6 Q. And in that time, you flew a number of different planes for him, right?
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. You mentioned the Hawker Siddeley, right?
9 A. Correct.
10 Q. And I think Mr. Epstein had that from roughly 1991 to '94; is that right?
11 A. That's correct. End of '94. December of '94 we got rid of it.
12 Q. He sold it in the end of '94? He sold it in the end of 1994?
13 A. Yes, December of '94 it was sold.
14 Q. Okay. And at that point he replaced the Hawker with a Gulfstream 2B, is that right?
15 A. That's correct.
16 Q. So that was roughly December of '94 when he got the Gulfstream?
17 A. No, we purchased the Gulfstream on February 2nd, 1994.
18 Q. Oh, I see.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00019024
